item.title: Go Http Request
item.description: Golang http request. 1 var hi = "hi"; 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 <section id="main"> <div> <h1 id="title">{{ .Title }}</h1> {{ range .Pages }} {{ .Render "summary"}} {{ end }} </div> </section> To send a http request, easily use "net/http" module.
